temp.description: Temperature. Unit Default: Kelvin, Metric: Celsius, Imperial: Fahrenheit

feels_like.description: Temperature. This temperature parameter accounts for the human perception of weather. Unit Default: Kelvin, Metric: Celsius, Imperial: Fahrenheit

temp_min.description: Minimum temperature at the moment. This is minimal currently observed temperature (within large megalopolises and urban areas). Unit Default: Kelvin, Metric: Celsius, Imperial: Fahrenheit. Please find more info here: https://openweathermap.org/current#min

temp_max.description: Maximum temperature at the moment. This is maximal currently observed temperature (within large megalopolises and urban areas). Unit Default: Kelvin, Metric: Celsius, Imperial: Fahrenheit. Please find more info here: https://openweathermap.org/current#min

pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure on the sea level, hPa

sea_level.description: Atmospheric pressure on the sea level, hPa

grnd_level.description: Atmospheric pressure on the ground level, hPa
